name: Just Talk to Her
description:
This game is part of series wherein I make one prototype per week based on a theme.

Prototype Week #10: Make a Game with the theme of "If I knew then what I know now."

Just Talk to Her.  An autobiographical game about my excruciating inability to talk to women.  Partly inspired by the "stupid piece of shit" moments in Bojack Horseman.

Original music by Dwayne Williamson.
